body: The [documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/api/winsock/nf-winsock-wsacleanup) makes it seem like calling this will terminate other uses of winsock from other threads. Is there a less drastic action?
body_html: The documentation makes it seem like calling this will terminate other uses of winsock from other threads. Is there a less drastic action?
body_text: The documentation makes it seem like calling this will terminate other uses of winsock from other threads. Is there a less drastic action?
